q: Tuesday, Democratic Sen. Joe Lieberman Kent Conrad , 62, who's led efforts to get the John McCain budget under control, said on Tuesday that he will not run for a sixth term in the Senate in 2012. It is more important Sen. Joe Lieberman spend my time and energy trying to solve these( budget) problems than to be distracted by a campaign for re-election, Kent Conrad said in a statement. Democrats now control the Senate 53-47. There are 51 Democrats and two independents-- Sen. Joe Lieberman and Sen. Bernie Sanders of Vermont, both of whom caucus with Democrats. Republicans are

Allen Iverson had 26 points, nine assists, and combined with Linas Kleiza , JR Smith and Eduardo Najera on a 14-1 fourth-quarter spurt that carried the Nuggets to a 125-114 victory over the New Jersey Nets on Friday night. We've been struggling, losing two on the road and we just wanted to do anything to get a win, Allen Iverson said after scoring 21 second-half points to help the Nuggets break a two-game losing streak. The Nuggets needed every one of those points after blowing a 17-point third-quarter lead and eventually falling behind by two.`` Welcome

mentor the contestants. The competition series will allow contestants as young as 12 to audition, a decision Simon Cowell defended on the call after being asked if kids that young should be subjects to public scrutiny. We've started to see a trend with kids this age and what they can do. I like the idea that a 12-year-old on this show can compete with an older singer... times have changed. You have to make a case-by-case decision based on them as a person. Contestants will have to audition before a live audience of 5,000 people in an arena.`` It was supposed to be similar to them doing their first concert. It really helped show me who could handle

in a 35-32 win at Detroit, Michael Vick made the most of his first pro start since 2006. He completed 21-of-34 passes for 284 yards and two touchdowns and rushed for 37 yards on seven carries. I'm here to announce that Michael Vick will be the starting quarterback for the Philadelphia Eagles. I think his performance has exceeded expectations the past several weeks, said Eagles head coach Andy Reid at an evening press conference.`` This is not about the health or the performance of Kevin Kolb ... this is more about Michael Vick and his accelerated play.'' He steals a tremendous amount of material, the Post quoted Howard Stern as saying.`` He's not fit to scrub David Letterman 's feet. I don't know how he's beaten David Letterman in the ratings. It's beyond my comprehension.

Google's Eric Schmidt Sees` Bubble' Google has made 87 acquisitions worth$ 8.4 billion in the last 10 years, but the recent high valuations placed on some high-profile Internet companies has Eric Schmidt scratching his head. There are clear signs of a bubble, Mr. Eric Schmidt told the Swiss magazine Bilanz.`` But valuations are what they are.'' SearchEngineLand editor Danny Sullivan noted that Google was probably long`` overdue'' for a major management reorganization. The structures between the three have remained exactly the same over the past 10 years- which might as well be 100 years of Internet time. SAN FRANCISCO( Reuters)- Chrysler Group LLC's chief executive apologized on Saturday for describing the high-interest bailout loans extended by the U.S. and Canadian governments in 2009 as`` shyster loans.'' Yesterday, in responding to a question about Chrysler's government loans, I used a term in reference to the interest rate being charged on our government loans that has raised concern, CEO Sergio Marchionne said in a statement.`` I regret the remark which I consider inappropriate.'' Shyster is a derogatory term used to describe an unprincipled lawyer or politician. He used the term at least
